text:
Ana Paula Borgo Bedani Da Cruz (born 20 October 1993) is a Brazilian volleyball player. She played for the Brazilian women's national volleyball team. She participated at the 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U23 World Championship, 2016 Montreux Volley Masters, and 2018 FIVB Volleyball Women's Club World Championship.
She played for Osasco Voleibol Clube.

annotations.surface_form: 2015 FIVB Volleyball Women's U23 World Championship
2018 FIVB Volleyball Women's Club World Championship
